title: Soap spoilers: EastEnders secrets revealed, Coronation Street birth, Emmerdale betrayal and Hollyoaks disaster
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures/ITV/BBC)

Tensions are running high, and feuds reach new heights in upcoming soap episodes. In EastEnders, Sharon Mitchell (Letitia Dean) is back from her holiday, but her feud with Mel Owen (Tamzin Outhwaite) is filled with even more animosity than before. Over in Coronation Street, David Platt (Jack P Shepherd) suffers as a result of Josh Tucker’s (Ryan Clayton) actions.

Elsewhere, Kim Tate (Claire King) is left devastated when Graham Foster (Andrew Scarborough) reveals a shocking secret, and in Hollyoaks disaster strikes.

EastEnders

1. Sharon returns from Portugal by herself, and her feud with Mel bubbles all the more, as Mel offers Ruby first refusal to buy the club. An enraged Sharon reveals to Ben that she’s only selling the club because of Mel, which prompts Ben to reveal a game-changing secret.

2. The Panesar family arrive in Walford and upon hearing of their arrival, Ben wastes little time in confronting them. However, he’s soon left embarassed when he realises that they’re not there to see him.

3. Honey is reeling when Mariam confronting her about Adam’s affair with Habiba, and pretends like she has no knowledge of such a thing, before claiming that Mariam is simply trying to split her and Adam up.

4. Dotty tries to sabotage Keegan’s business, and once Tiffany discovers what she did, she’s fuming, and thus wastes little time in confronting her about it.

5. At the Queen Vic’s Halloween party, Chantelle encourages Whitney to go and speak to Leo and, after she does so, passion ensues, as the pair share a passionate kiss.

6. Bobby grows frustrated when Ian decides on becoming Walford’s newest councillor.

7. Ian isn’t pleased when he realises that Keegan hasn’t closed down his business and thus he decides to take action.

Coronation Street

8. Daniel struggles with organising Sinead’s funeral and, later, he defends Bethany in the corner shop — an incident which Beth soon finds out about, and she accuses him of having an affair before Sinead’s even cold. Daniel later visits Ken and reveals that him and Bertie are setting off for Scotland so that they can get away from everything. An upset Beth worries that she’ll never see her Godson again as a result.

9. With news of Sinead’s death still fresh in her mind, Tracy struggles to cope. However, Liz offers a solution when she suggests that Tracy come to Spain with her for a week.

10. Never missing an opportunity to meddle, Jade convinces Fiz that she should go and be with her mum — who’s had an accident — and that she’ll look after the kids in her absence. After Fiz sets off, Jade makes Tyrone and Evelyn a present, before handing Tyrone a gift.

11. With Bernie’s magazine interview having painted Chesney like a love rat, Gemma is determined to get a break from the Street. Chesney managed to smuggle them out of the house amid the press outside, and they agree to spend the day at Llandudno. However, disaster strikes as Gemma goes into labour while in a cable car.

12. Emma arrives into work feeling unwell. Maria asks Ali to take a look at her, but he’s got other things on his mind — what with him having learned that Maria is going on a date with Gary — thus he tells her it’s probably just food poisoning. However, Gary and Maria later find Emma unconscious on the floor of her flat.

13. Imran reveals that Josh has lied to the police about David’s involvement in the attack, and thus framed him. Shona’s dreams of having David home in time for the wedding are ultimately dashed.

14. With her family struggling more than ever, Gail decides its time to stop the fighting and bring them all back together.

Emmerdale

15. Desperate for cash to pay casino boss Terry back, Mandy and Vinny try to hack into Lydia’s bank account. However, while doing so, Lydia catches them in the act and, as a result, Zak calls Dingle court into session.

16. Growing ever so suspicious of Graham, Kim admits the she’s jealous of his mystery woman. However, she later spots Graham arguing with Andrea and jumps to the wrong conclusion, presuming that Andrea is his mystery girl.

17. After Jamie discovers that Rhona has been seeing Graham, he lectures Graham on the definition of loyalty, but Graham retaliates by revealing to Kim that Jamie was the one who delivered the evidence that resulted in Kim going to prison — a revelation which leaves the Tate businesswoman devastated.

Advertisement

18. Charity knows more about Mandy’s dodgy dealings than meets the eye — something which comes to light as Mandy delivers a few truths about what she’s been getting up to.

19. Dingle court proves incredibly challenging for Vinny, as he’s worried the deliberations will bring to light another secret.

20. The Dingles get the shock of their lives when the villainous Terry arrives on their doorstep, and they’re left in fear of their lives.

Hollyoaks

21. The day of DJ’s christening arrives, and Ollie is desperate to find Luke. However, unbeknown to Ollie, Darren has invited Luke to the service.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

22. Breda tells Tony that their current arrangement can no longer carry on, and thus she has to put him out of his mystery — that is, until she receives a phone call from Goldie, which prompts her to reconsider, and she agrees to let Tony go home. But will she follow through on her promise?

23. The diggers and cranes arrive, as work on Cindy’s ‘Grande Bizarre’ project commences. Tom continues to berate her over her lack of concern for the safety regulations, but she’s having none of it, and disaster soon strikes.

24. Charlie and Ella find themselves trapped in the tunnels below the village, as the ceiling above begins to cave in.

25. Mercedes relishes in being hostess as everyone flees to The Dog amid all of the commotion.
